ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars

Megatron:





"If Miss Black Arachnia wants me to claim leadership of the 
Predacons, then have her explain the situation back at your base with 
your troops firing on my followers and I, and also the death of two 
other of my Predacons." Megatron replied to Paraylsis through his 
comm-link. "Can I really trust a open welcoming?"
